controls.title: Account lockout period
controls.desc:
Accounts locked due to unsuccessful logon attempts will stay locked
  until unlocked by an administrator.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data:
Accounts locked due to unsuccessful logon attempts will stay locked
  until unlocked by an administrator.

tags.check: In security parameters, check if LockoutPeriod = 999

controls.code:
control 'rsa-archer-1.12' do
  title 'Account lockout period'
  desc 'Accounts locked due to unsuccessful logon attempts will stay locked
  until unlocked by an administrator.'
  impact 0.5
  tag 'check': 'In security parameters, check if LockoutPeriod = 999'
  tag 'fix': 'In security parameters, set LockoutPeriod = 999'
  tag 'nist': ['AC-7', 'Rev_4']

  archer_api_helper = archer(url: attribute('url'),
                             instancename: attribute('instancename'),
                             user_domain: attribute('user_domain'),
                             username: attribute('username'),
                             password: attribute('password'),
                             ssl_verify: attribute('ssl_verify'))

  describe archer_api_helper do
    its('default_administrative_user.LockoutPeriod') { should cmp >= 999}
    its('general_user_parameter.LockoutPeriod') { should cmp >= 999 }
    its('archer_services_parameter.LockoutPeriod') { should cmp >= 999 }
  end
end

results.code_desc: Archer Instance sandy default_administrative_user.LockoutPeriod should cmp >= 999
Archer Instance sandy general_user_parameter.LockoutPeriod should cmp >= 999
Archer Instance sandy archer_services_parameter.LockoutPeriod should cmp >= 999

controls.title: Uppercase characters required
controls.desc:
When passwords are changed or new passwords are established, the new
  password must contain at least one uppercase character.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data:
When passwords are changed or new passwords are established, the new
  password must contain at least one uppercase character.

tags.check: In security parameters, check if UppercaseCharsRequired = 1

controls.code:
control 'rsa-archer-1.5' do
  title 'Uppercase characters required'
  desc 'When passwords are changed or new passwords are established, the new
  password must contain at least one uppercase character.'
  impact 0.5
  tag 'check': 'In security parameters, check if UppercaseCharsRequired = 1'
  tag 'fix': 'In security parameters, set UppercaseCharsRequired = 1'
  tag 'nist': ['IA-5(1)', 'Rev_4']

  archer_api_helper = archer(url: attribute('url'),
                             instancename: attribute('instancename'),
                             user_domain: attribute('user_domain'),
                             username: attribute('username'),
                             password: attribute('password'),
                             ssl_verify: attribute('ssl_verify'))

  describe archer_api_helper do
    its('default_administrative_user.UppercaseCharsRequired') { should cmp >= 1 }
    its('general_user_parameter.UppercaseCharsRequired') { should cmp >= 1 }
    its('archer_services_parameter.UppercaseCharsRequired') { should cmp >= 1 }
  end
end

controls.title: Password change interval

controls.title: Grace logons
controls.desc:
After password expiration, zero grace logons are permitted using the
  expired password.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data:
After password expiration, zero grace logons are permitted using the
  expired password.

tags.check: In security parameters, check if GraceLogins = 0

controls.code:
control 'rsa-archer-1.9' do
  title 'Grace logons'
  desc 'After password expiration, zero grace logons are permitted using the
  expired password.'
  impact 0.5
  tag 'check': 'In security parameters, check if GraceLogins = 0'
  tag 'fix': 'In security parameters, set GraceLogins = 0'
  tag 'nist': ['IA-5(1)', 'Rev_4']

  archer_api_helper = archer(url: attribute('url'),
                             instancename: attribute('instancename'),

                             username: attribute('username'),
                             password: attribute('password'),
                             ssl_verify: attribute('ssl_verify'))

  describe archer_api_helper do
    its('default_administrative_user.GraceLogins') { should cmp 0 }
    its('general_user_parameter.GraceLogins') { should cmp 0 }
    its('archer_services_parameter.GraceLogins') { should cmp 0 }
  end
end

results.code_desc: Archer Instance sandy default_administrative_user.GraceLogins should cmp == 0
Archer Instance sandy general_user_parameter.GraceLogins should cmp == 0
Archer Instance sandy archer_services_parameter.GraceLogins should cmp == 0

controls.title: Session time-out
controls.desc:
The operating system must initiate a session time-out after a 10 minute
  period of inactivity

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data:
The operating system must initiate a session time-out after a 10 minute
  period of inactivity

tags.check: In security parameters, check if SessionTimeout = 10

controls.code:
control 'rsa-archer-1.11' do
  title 'Session time-out'
  desc 'The operating system must initiate a session time-out after a 10 minute
  period of inactivity '
  impact 0.5
  tag 'check': 'In security parameters, check if SessionTimeout = 10'
  tag 'fix': 'In security parameters, set SessionTimeout = 10'
  tag 'nist': ['AC-11', 'Rev_4']

  archer_api_helper = archer(url: attribute('url'),
                             instancename: attribute('instancename'),
                             user_domain: attribute('user_domain'),
                             username: attribute('username'),
                             password: attribute('password'),
                             ssl_verify: attribute('ssl_verify'))

  describe archer_api_helper do
    its('default_administrative_user.SessionTimeout') { should cmp <= 10 }
    its('general_user_parameter.SessionTimeout') { should cmp <= 10 }
    its('archer_services_parameter.SessionTimeout') { should cmp <= 10 }
  end
end

results.message:
expected it to be <= 10
     got: 90

(compared using `cmp` matcher)

results.code_desc: Archer Instance sandy general_user_parameter.SessionTimeout should cmp <= 10
Archer Instance sandy archer_services_parameter.SessionTimeout should cmp <= 10
results.message:
expected it to be <= 10
     got: 30

(compared using `cmp` matcher)
